DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy and safety of PF-3512676 administered in combination with erlotinib in patients with advanced EGFR-positive non-small cell lung cancer after failure of at least one prior chemotherapy regimen.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Of Erlotinib With Or Without PF-3512676 In Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Advanced, EGFRpositive NSCLC ECOG Performance Status 0, 1 or 2 Measurable disease Known CNS metastasis Preexisting autoimmune or antibody mediated disease
DOC.keyword: advanced carcinoma non-small cell lung EGFR positive Erlotinib Tarceva PF-3512676 Phase II immunotherapy immune modulator
